q_en: What materials were used in Olivia's order?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Olivia';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 7;
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (7);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for each order belonging to "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT material_id, number FROM product_material WHERE product_id IN (18, 17, 10);
steps.description: Retrieve the material IDs and quantities used for each product in "Olivia's" orders

steps.sql: SELECT name FROM materials WHERE id IN (8, 12, 6, 4, 10, 2);
steps.description: Retrieve the material names for the material IDs obtained in Step4

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the materials used in Olivia's order. Here's a breakdown of the materials and their quantities:

| Material Name            | Quantity |
|--------------------------|----------|
| Fabric Pieces            | 3        |
| Wool Pieces              | 4        |
| Silk Pieces              | 6        |
| Leather Pieces           | 2        |
| Synthetic Fiber Pieces   | 4        |
| Denim Fabric Pieces      | 3        |

It looks like Olivia's order is quite diverse with a variety of materials! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. üòÑ
